ISSUE.TITLE: JWT secret should be generated client-side only
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If I understand the HTTP network stream correctly, the JWT secret that is automatically generated here https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/5e7817548b7972a72370dfa70550eda69a6664a1/apps/docs/components/JwtGenerator/JwtGenerator.tsx#L28 e.g. in context of https://supabase.com/docs/guides/self-hosting/docker#generate-api-keys, is actually generated on the server (SSR). I would prefer the JWT secret to be generated and visible to my local browser only. I am not a React dev (yet) but it seems using `dynamic()` for the `JwtGenerator` should do the trick.
